verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-LOC: on MSNBC] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARG1: Republican strategist Steve Schmidt] issued a stunning rebuke of GOP lawmakers for their servile behavior to President Donald Trump , who he described as a threat to constitutional democracy .
